Spread the Word: Get Rewarded for Your Referrals!
<http://www.solar4worcester.com>
Did You Know You Can Earn Cash for Referrals?
Astrum Solar is spreading the word about solar to Massachusetts residents! Astrum Solar’s business is based on the numerous referrals from our satisfied customers. A 9.8 kW solar home is at the root of the Astrum Solar customer family tree that got its start in one community.
We love referrals and reward our customers who spread the word about the benefits of going solar the right way with Astrum Solar. Do you know someone in Massachusetts who may benefit from going solar? As an Astrum Solar customer, you can earn a cash reward for any referral that switches to solar with Astrum Solar—you will receive $250 and your referral will receive $250!*
$1,000 Discount for Massachusetts Residents!
When you refer your friends and family to Astrum Solar, they will enjoy their independence from unpredictable electricity prices and lock in their own electricity rates. Choosing solar will put them in control of their own power generation and free them from ever-increasing utility rates. In addition to these benefits, they’ll receive a $1,000 discount through September 30!** Encourage your friends and family friends and family to request their free roof surveys today to take advantage of this special offer!
Referring is as Easy as 1-2-3!
1.) Encourage your friends and family to visit www.solar4worcester.com <http://www.solar4worcester.com>
2.) When your referral fills out the form and reaches the “How did you hear about us” field, they should select “Referral by Customer/Employee.”
3.) A text box will populate. Your referral should include your name as the referring party. That’s it!
Special Event on August 26 7:00 PM – 8:00 PM Courtyard Worcester | 72 Grove Street | Worcester, MA 01605
Astrum Solar will be hosting a Solar Seminar on August 26 for all Massachusetts residents, families, and friends! Join us for a short presentation and learn about the money-saving and environmental benefits of going solar with Astrum. Refreshments will be served.
An expert will be on hand to answer any questions about what’s involved in going solar and to assess solar potential and electricity savings for Massachusetts residents. This is a great opportunity for your friends and family in Massachusetts to learn about the benefits of going solar, and for you to get rewarded for referring them. Encourage them to reserve their spot at this special event!
View event information and spread the word! <http://solarforworcester.eventbrite.com>
You’re receiving this email because you are an Astrum Solar customer.
*You must be an Astrum Solar customer to participate in the Astrum Solar Referral Program. For each referral that signs a solar contract with Astrum Solar, you will receive $250 and your referral will receive $250. Individuals may not refer themselves. Referrals must have no prior contact with Astrum Solar to be considered a customer referral. Payment is sent within 30 days of the sale.
**LIMITED TIME OFFER: Valid for qualifying homes that sign a new solar system contract with Astrum Solar by September 30, 2014. In lieu of a cash rebate, customers can opt to use the $1,000 as a down payment to reduce their monthly solar fees or to receive a $1,000 discount off the contract price at the time of their purchase. Otherwise, $1,000 cash back rebate to be mailed approximately 30 days after the system is installed. Minimum system size is 5 kW. Qualifying homes must be located in a territory that Astrum Solar serves. Offer is in addition to other available promotions or discounts.
A solar power system is customized for your home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas. MA 168228
